0.1.55 Bookmarks add support to Mobile
use new plugin wrapper macros for bookmarks plugin
tweak delauny code to be more strict on it's colinear detection
cache the map data tiles for a short time. this can vastly reduce our load on the niantic servers, especially in the case of multiple repeated scroll/zoom actions in the same area
switch to map on bookmark click
code formatting
reload after plugin with the reload-method to stay consistent with the action bar

added back 'press twice to exit' (fixes #356)
- there is no reason why we shouldn't do it this way
made press twice to exit an option (see #356)
some refactoring of the zoom level handling. will make it easy and relatively friendly on the servers to boost the map detail level for given zoom levels

decrease standard refresh time to 30 seconds, so chat is more up to date
increase map tile cache to 2 minutes, so the increased refresh for chat does not impact map data tile requests
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/jonatkins/ingress-intel-total-conversion

remove partial portal zoom level boost from code - moving complete code into a plugin
log data vs map zoom to console

new plugin: show more portals, as if the map was zoomed in one additional level
yes, this does increase the requests to the niantic servers, but with the new cache code it's not that bad
data tile cache: send ajax requests before processing cached data

improved idle handling
- times are now in seconds rather than minutes, like all other IITC time settings
- ignore mousemove events for no/small movements - more likely to go idle when it should
idle - fix log to refer to seconds rather than minutes
idle handling - treat the window being hidden as idle, even if the idle time wasn't reached

guess player levels plugin: add a 'reset' button to the dialog to reset the guessed levels
handy to clear out bad guesses due to ada refactor/jarvis virus use
update idle handling - prevents the status getting stuck showing 'idle' after hiding+showing the window

change the callback from resuming from idle, so it starts a short refresh timeout as if the map had just moved
this way, if you switch back to IITC, then quickly move/zoom (as often is done), unnecessary network requests are avoided
because of the change, there's no need for chat to have it's own resume hook - it already hooks into the refresh code and this is now triggered quickly

Revert 'switch to map on bookmark click'

Mobile status bar
order requests to inprove the odds of getting missing tile data when some requests are likely to timeout, by putting uncached tile ids at the start of the request, cached (but stale) at the end

map status improvements, reporting status of cache. basic 'error/out of date/up to date' message, and tool tip with tile counts
for #394

add optional parameter sto allow chat code to specify it's uncertain if a name is right
needed for #393 (but not actually a fix)

comment out 'redeem code' input box
(instead of #371 - didn't want to actually delete it as it may return)

cache improvements
- min and max size - expire early if over max size, don't expire if below min size
- increase max cache age to an hour

don't treat names resolved from old chat messages as certain - only new ones
this prevents people having a name change from getting inconsistant results as old/new messages are seen
fix #393

add link amp mod range calculation to portal range
(it involves some guessing, as only 'rare' ones have been seen so far)
alternative to #392
part of #374

simplify logic for grouping map data requests into buckets - zero advantages seen with various different grouping methods tried

reduce the bucket size limit - same number of requests at normal resolutions, and less timeouts (but more requests) at higher resolutions

display portal mod stats in a more useful format
(however, it doesn't take account of how multiple mods of a type stack - some are linear add, others multiply percentages)

plugin to disable map zooming with the mouse wheel
